Cheril Perils

by Mojon Twins

Released Jul 1, 2010
Players 1
License Unknown

Download ROM

Description

Control Cheril in the doomed city of Yellowenia, infested with zombies. Your mission is relatively easy to understand: smash 60 zombies using the method of busting them jumping on their fragile skulls. When you can see them coming, just drop on them! Jump on them! KILL'EM ALL! When you have slain all the 60 zombies, the mayor will remove the boulders which block the exit, in the very first screen of the game. So when you are done, just leave. Good luck!
